posts.post_content: Mode: *"Red Berserk? At any time!"* Well, it's a Red [Berserk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Berserk) that can't be used as last-ditch-effort removal, which is a janky use for Berserk in one-on-one but great in multiplayer, where you can also use it to help a player take out a third party. Fatal Frenzy is still a really good card, but not as versatile as Berserk. As for the +{2} to the CMC over Berserk, totally reasonable, as Berserk should have cost more than 1 CMC anyway.
posts.html:
Mode: "Red Berserk? At any time!" Well, it's a Red Berserk that can't be used as last-ditch-effort removal, which is a janky use for Berserk in one-on-one but great in multiplayer, where you can also use it to help a player take out a third party. Fatal Frenzy is still a really good card, but not as versatile as Berserk. As for the +{2} to the CMC over Berserk, totally reasonable, as Berserk should have cost more than 1 CMC anyway.
